basics.label: Coordinator, Donor Relations
basics.summary: Highly organized Communications Specialist. Highly qualified, detail-oriented and hardworking with proficiency in research, writing, case management and client relations. Expert computing and technology skills including competence in multiple software applications, website design (HTML), CMS and hosting, networking issues and social media.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Track and analyze donor data received from volunteer projects to effectively cultivate relationships. Research, identify, and analyze past campaign activities...
highlights: Developed and implemented an internal communications strategy
Produced internal and external communications collateral
Assist with the development and implementation of changes to volunteer programs

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Served as primary liaison for internal and external constituencies...
highlights: Organized logistics of special events, travel arrangements, corporate agendas, and itineraries

work.name: Company Name
highlights: Communicated and negotiated with FedEx SupplyChain for delivery updates and changes
Resolved customer complaints and concerns with strong verbal and negotiation skills

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Managed editorial deadlines under the direction of the Creative Marketing Director...
highlights: Managed social media accounts for the website
Created press releases and promotional materials
Maintained awareness of digital trends and new emerging technologies and platforms
